value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|"Surrender Veronica..."$k$pWhoever sent this letter is backing
the unknown army.$k$pI recognize the crest that sealed it... It
comes from one of the worlds
invaded by the Emblian Empire.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_ELECTION01,Face|They want me?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_ELECTION01,Face|This Veronica is lending her strength
to the pursuit of peace. We will not
simply hand her over to the enemy.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|That may be the case, but all the
enemy sees is the face of the
princess who invaded their home.$k$pEven if we try to explain that she's a
completely different person, it's
unlikely they'll listen.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Commander Anna, the enemy is
nearing the tower!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_ELECTION01,Face|A battle is about to begin simply
because of my presence... I do not
want this.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_ELECTION01,Face|That right there is exactly why we will
not let them take you.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_ELECTION01,Face|You have committed no offense,
Princess Veronica, so we will not
allow you to be punished.$k$pYou were summoned here along with
the rest of us. That makes us allies.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_ELECTION01,Face|Allies...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_ELECTION01,Face|Everything will be all right, Princess
Veronica. It is a mere
misunderstanding.$k$pI'm sure they'll listen to reason. We
must at least try speaking with them.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Well, this calls for our special Order
of Heroes persuasion technique. It'll
take some time, though.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Until then, we must keep Veronica
safe inside this tower!$k$p
